item.title: [Daily] Skills.sh snapshot (2026-02-05)
item.description: Daily snapshot. Providers: skills.sh All Time skills: 16231 Trending skills: 7079 Hot skills: 1975 Top All Time: find-skills (111819) Top Trending: find-skills (11697) Top Hot: audit-website (32)

item.title: [All Time] New entry (#30): web-search
item.description: New entry in All Time leaderboard. Rank: #30 Installs: 5223 Source: inference-sh/skills Description: Web search and content extraction with Tavily and Exa via inference.sh CLI. Apps: Tavily Search, Tavily Extract, Exa Search, Exa Answer, Exa Extract. Capabilities: AI-powered search, content extraction, direct answers, research. Use for: research, RAG pipelines, fact-checking, content aggregation, agents. Triggers: web search, tavily, exa, search api, content extraction, research, internet search, ai search, search assistant, web scraping, rag, perplexity alternative

item.title: [All Time] New entry (#32): ai-video-generation
item.description: New entry in All Time leaderboard. Rank: #32 Installs: 4866 Source: inference-sh/skills Description: Generate AI videos with Google Veo, Seedance, Wan, Grok and 40+ models via inference.sh CLI. Models: Veo 3.1, Veo 3, Seedance 1.5 Pro, Wan 2.5, Grok Imagine Video, OmniHuman, Fabric, HunyuanVideo. Capabilities: text-to-video, image-to-video, lipsync, avatar animation, video upscaling, foley sound. Use for: social media videos, marketing content, explainer videos, product demos, AI avatars. Triggers: video generation, ai video, text to video, image to video, veo, animate image, video from image, ai animation, video generator, generate video, t2v, i2v, ai video maker, create video with ai, runway alternative, pika alternative, sora alternative, kling alternative

item.title: [All Time] New entry (#42): twitter-automation
item.description: New entry in All Time leaderboard. Apps: x/post-tweet, x/post-create (with media), x/post-like, x/post-retweet, x/dm-send, x/user-follow. Applies Strunk's timeless rules for clearer, stronger, more professional writing.

item.title: [All Time] New entry (#48): session-handoff
item.description: New entry in All Time leaderboard. Rank: #48 Installs: 4486 Source: softaworks/agent-toolkit Description: Creates comprehensive handoff documents for seamless AI agent session transfers. Triggered when: (1) user requests handoff/memory/context save, (2) context window approaches capacity, (3) major task milestone completed, (4) work session ending, (5) user says 'save state', 'create handoff', 'I need to pause', 'context is getting full', (6) resuming work with 'load handoff', 'resume from', 'continue where we left off'. Proactively suggests handoffs after substantial work (multiple file edits, complex debugging, architecture decisions). Solves long-running agent context exhaustion by enabling fresh agents to continue with zero ambiguity.

item.title: [All Time] New entry (#49): codex
item.description: New entry in All Time leaderboard. Rank: #49 Installs: 4482 Source: softaworks/agent-toolkit Description: Use when the user asks to run Codex CLI (codex exec, codex resume) or references OpenAI Codex for code analysis, refactoring, or automated editing. Uses GPT-5.2 by default for state-of-the-art software engineering.
